6. No signs will be displayed above the first floor, except where
they are an architectural part of the building or where there
are stores on the walkway level and signing has been taken into
consideration in the design of the building. :

7. No roof signs will be permitted. :

8. These sign controls shall apply not only to fabricated signs but
also to lettering on designs that are painted or applied to the
side or outside of windows, or to other exterior surfaces.

9. Signs placed within 3' - 0" of windows shall be subject to the
same controls as exterior signs.

10. The name of the sign manufacturer may not appear on the sign.
Exceptions may be made to the above rules at the sole discretion of
the General Manager of Charles Center, but only when unique or un-
precedented circumstances provide sufficient justification.

The above procedure does not apply to signs for which full information

is provided and approved as part of a submission of Construction Plans
for a Charles Center development.

27
